13 | 2023-11-20 | SCREENING ORDER signed by Magistrate Judge William E Duffin on 11/20/2023 re 1 Plaintiffs' Proposed Class Action Complaint. Plaintiffs' demands for compensatory and punitive damages are DISMISSED, as all defendants are being sued only in their official capacities. The defendants shall answer or otherwise respond to the remainder of the complaint, as to the injunctive relief requested, within 21 days of this order. (cc: all counsel)(lz)

extracted.value: Defendant: Wisconsin Department of Corrections (in official capacity)
